title: Hiding Spoilers on LOLesports?
body: How do I hide the results of matches when going to VoDs and other pages on LoL Esports? It's ruining everything for me.

replies.body:
If you use this link.....

http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/vods/worlds/world_championship_2017

You should be able to go straight to the VODS page without having anything spoiled for you!
